Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the office of addiction services and supports to collect certain demographic data
Summary: Requires the office of addiction services and supports to collect certain demographic data for incarcerated individuals in medication assisted treatment programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง626, Cor L; amd ยง19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to data collected for medication assisted treatment programs at correctional facilities
